EmailTemplate.description: Important: AuraDS Product Changes in Salesforce
EmailTemplate.name: Upcoming Change: AuraDS Product Name Changes in SFDC
EmailTemplate.subject: SMALL CORRECTION! Important: AuraDS Product Changes in Salesforce
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello Salesforce Users!
This alert is intended for users who add products to opportunities in Salesforce, report on products, and especially for users whose reports reference 'Neo4j - AuraDS' product name in their filters.
The two changes outlined below are scheduled to take place on Thursday, January 13th.
**WHAT YOU NEED TO KNOW**
The existing Product "Neo4j - AuraDS" is being renamed to "Neo4j - AuraDS - Multi-Tenant".
New SKU,"Neo4j - AuraDS - VPS Isolated", is being added to SFDC.
This change will impact any report that references product names in itse filters, specifically ''Neo4j - AuraDS" -- the product records will be omitted from the report results.
If you reference product names in your reports, please update your report filters by replacing "Neo4j - AuraDS" with "Neo4j - AuraDS - Multi-Tenant" AND adding "Neo4j - AuraDS - VPS Isolated".
Please let us know if you have any questions by reaching out to us at salesforce@neo4j.com.
Thank you, Salesforce Team
